attributes.action: Call for the removal of aid to Sudan following the arrest of Gillian Gibbons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call for the removal of aid to Sudan and the withdrawal of British workers following the arrest and detention of Gillian Gibbon for "inciting hatred" by naming a teddy bear Mohammed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
